property_title: High-Rise Apartment FOR SALE in Limassol, Potamos Germasogeias
property_description: Located in one of the best areas of Limassol, 200m from the sea, a luxurious high-rise residential project spanning vertically over 25 storeys.  Set to be completed in 2025, the project is designed to resemble a floating structure above the waterfront, welcoming those who long to reside in a fully integrated urban development with style and highest specifications.  Using lightness, transparency and luminosity as an architectural language, attempting to blend sky, sea, and ground seamlessly.  It uses reinforced concrete structure, bricks for internal walls, glass, wood, and introduces luscious landscaped areas both with its gardens on the ground floor as well as the 16th level Executive floor/Sky Garden/Restaurant, to enhance the tranquil atmosphere created for the residents. The vast variety of communal features that have been accommodated within the design in order to serve the residents only reinforce this sense of luxury. The linearity in the geometry of the square, which spans over 1600m2 directs the visitors towards the building while accentuating its connectivity to the seafront. Upon entering into the 3000m2 private gardens, the residents are surrounded by the synergy of the different elements; the water and rich landscaping along with private and protected recreational space. The elevated, external 25-meter swimming pool, acts as a focal point around which the private spaces develop, working as a continuation of the square’s geometries, creating a connection between the lower entrance levels of the development. The large indoor heated swimming pool adds up to the amenities of the project. The Wellness & Spa zones that are directly adjacent to the main Swimming pool area, encompass numerous amenities for the residents to enjoy. An absolutely unique feature is it comprises two lounge/barbeque areas at each residential floor (except the penthouses) with centralized extraction system and all facilities. All 65 apartments and 2 magnificent penthouses of the project were carefully designed in order to enjoy uninterrupted sea views, providing that sought-after luxury island lifestyle. The internal finishes are all hand-selected as part of exclusive finishes encompassed within the project. Natural marbles and granites, top niche wood flooring and Italian kitchen and wardrobes dress the internal of the properties. The three level penthouses located on the top floors of the building, offer exclusive 360 views of the city, private roof gardens as well as private infinity swimming pools. Combining a wide range of luxury features and amenities, becoming a flagship to the island, and the place to live. The apartments offer the ultimate in calm, elegance and simplicity of leading contemporary design, while providing spectacular views across the sea and Limassol skyline.Covered veranda includes covered BBQ 58.4 sq.m. and covered garden 23.8 sq.m.

property_title: High-Rise Apartment FOR SALE in Limassol, Potamos Germasogeias
property_description: Located in one of the best areas of Limassol, 200m from the sea, a luxurious high-rise residential project spanning vertically over 25 storeys.  Set to be completed in 2025, the project is designed to resemble a floating structure above the waterfront, welcoming those who long to reside in a fully integrated urban development with style and highest specifications.  Using lightness, transparency and luminosity as an architectural language, attempting to blend sky, sea, and ground seamlessly. It uses reinforced concrete structure, bricks for internal walls, glass, wood, and introduces luscious landscaped areas both with its gardens on the ground floor as well as the 16th level Executive floor/Sky Garden/Restaurant, to enhance the tranquil atmosphere created for the residents. The vast variety of communal features that have been accommodated within the design in order to serve the residents only reinforce this sense of luxury. The linearity in the geometry of the square, which spans over 1600m2 directs the visitors towards the building while accentuating its connectivity to the seafront. Upon entering into the 3000m2 private gardens, the residents are surrounded by the synergy of the different elements; the water and rich landscaping along with private and protected recreational space. The elevated, external 25-meter swimming pool, acts as a focal point around which the private spaces develop, working as a continuation of the square’s geometries, creating a connection between the lower entrance levels of the development. The large indoor heated swimming pool adds up to the amenities of the project. The Wellness & Spa zones that are directly adjacent to the main Swimming pool area, encompass numerous amenities for the residents to enjoy. An absolutely unique feature is it comprises two lounge/barbeque areas at each residential floor (except the penthouses) with centralized extraction system and all facilities. All 65 apartments and 2 magnificent penthouses of the project were carefully designed in order to enjoy uninterrupted sea views, providing that sought-after luxury island lifestyle. The internal finishes are all hand-selected as part of exclusive finishes encompassed within the project. Natural marbles and granites, top niche wood flooring and Italian kitchen and wardrobes dress the internal of the properties. The three level penthouses located on the top floors of the building, offer exclusive 360 views of the city, private roof gardens as well as private infinity swimming pools. Combining a wide range of luxury features and amenities, becoming a flagship to the island, and the place to live. The apartments offer the ultimate in calm, elegance and simplicity of leading contemporary design, while providing spectacular views across the sea and Limassol skyline.Covered veranda includes covered sun deck 287.1 sq.m. and covered roof terrace 113.1 sq.m. Uncovered veranda includes uncovered roof terrace 422.2 sq.m.
